channel.title: Basic Java Help please
channel.description:
Hi, I'm a huge noob at coding java. I'm a real good learner of anything coding/computer wise. But when it comes to java, I'm probably the biggest noob ever. I'm just wondering if someone can give me a link to a tutorial or where I can start teaching myself java coding, I would love to learn it.
I'm not asking for anyone to answer this for me because I'd like to find it out on my own and learn. I have this error on one of my .class files when trying to declare a public class.
[code]Class9.java:367: illegal start of expression public Class44 aClass44; ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I'm guessing my answer is fairly easy but I am brand new at this stuff and I would love to learn what to do so I can do it myself in the future!
Thanks In advance! :D

item.title: Basic Java Help please
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

Hmm I was always bad at the illegal start of expression ones too, :S

Read full topic
